"010 111 000 00001010", -- MOVI R7,10
"111 010 111 00000000", -- COPY R2,R7
"010 001 000 00001100", -- MOVI R1,12
"100 111 001 00000000", -- MUL R7,R1
"001 111 000 00000000", -- NEG R7
"000 111 010 00000000", -- ADD R7,R2
"011 111 000 00001000", -- JZR R7,8
"101 000 000 00000101", -- JUMP 5
"010 011 000 00000001", -- MOVI R3,1
"001 011 000 00000000", -- NEG R3
"010 100 000 00001111", -- MOVI R4,15
"000 111 010 00000000", -- ADD R7,R2
"000 100 011 00000000", -- ADD R4,R3
"110 100 000 00001011", -- JNZ R4,11
"010 111 000 00100011", -- MOVI R7,35
"011 000 000 00001110"  -- JZR R0,14



===========
	"01011100000001010", -- MOVI R7,10
        "11101011100000000", -- COPY R2,R7
        "01000100000001100", -- MOVI R1,12
        "10011100100000000", -- MUL R7,R1
        "00111100000000000", -- NEG R7
        "00011101000000000", -- ADD R7,R2
        "01111100000001000", -- JZR R7,8
        "10100000000000101", -- JUMP 5
        "01001100000000001", -- MOVI R3,1
        "00101100000000000", -- NEG R3
        "01010000000001111", -- MOVI R4,15
        "00011101000000000", -- ADD R7,R2
        "00010001100000000", -- ADD R4,R3
        "11010000000001011", -- JNZ R4,11
        "01011100000100011", -- MOVI R7,35
        "01100000000001110" -- JZR R0,14
